TextureUpdate; TextureUpdateSlot decal; ValidatePlayer RaceIsZerg; !HasStatus OwnedByZerg
TextureUpdate; TextureUpdateSlot decal; ValidatePlayer PlayerIsBWZe; !HasStatus OwnedByZerg

HostSiteOpsSet ::Host {SOpAttachHarness SOpAttachCenter WhiffOffsetDirect SOpMoveUpByDot5 WhiffOffsetRandomMassive SOpForwardLaunchGuideInverted} 1 1

SOpAttachHead SOpShadow SOpForwardCasterCenterInverted SOp2DRotation SOpMoveByDot3 SOpSplashDamagePositionVariance SOpRollClockwise90
